channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 1cfa4eac-9a23-481c-a793-bfb6958e836b
Display name: Azure Migrate Execute Expert
Description: Grants restricted access on an Azure Migrate project to only perform migration related operations, including replication, execution of test migrations, tracking and monitoring of migration progress, and initiation of agentless and agent-based migrations.
Link: https://management.azure.com/1cfa4eac-9a23-481c-a793-bfb6958e836b?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 7859c0b0-0bb9-4994-bd12-cd529af7d646
Display name: Azure Migrate Decide and Plan Expert
Description: Grants restricted access on Azure Migrate project to only perform planning operations including appliance-based discovery, managing inventory, identifying server dependencies, creation of business case & assessment reports.
Link: https://management.azure.com/7859c0b0-0bb9-4994-bd12-cd529af7d646?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: ba480ccd-6499-4709-b581-8f38bb215c63
Display name: Azure Migrate Service Reader
Description: Grants required access to the system assigned managed identity of Azure Migrate project resource.
Link: https://management.azure.com/ba480ccd-6499-4709-b581-8f38bb215c63?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: fd8ea4d5-6509-4db0-bada-356ab233b4fa
Display name: Azure Migrate Owner
Description: Grants full access to create and manage Azure Migrate projects including appliance-based discovery, creation of business case & assessment report and execution of migrations; Also grants ability to assign Azure Migrate specific roles in Azure RBAC.
Link: https://management.azure.com/fd8ea4d5-6509-4db0-bada-356ab233b4fa?api-version=2022-04-01
